unnormalised: Bore zalem, tum Goenk vochpacho yevzon korunk asa? Zabardast! Punn tum tuka lagopi sunscreen ani shades pack korchea poilim, ekdom bore disonam punn itleach motvache vostuncher uloioum: tunchi travel identifiers samballunk. Mhaka kollta, bore disona, punn mhaka patie, thoddem sangatikponn tuka dher trasantle rakhunk zata.
normalised: Bore, tum Goak tumcho zaito kall thambun ravteleo tripichi yojna kortat, kithe? Zabardast! Pun tumi tumchea sunscreen ani shades pack korche adim, chala apun thodi un glamourous pun titich mhotvachi gostichi galo kortat: tumchi travel identifiers-chi track dovrun. Mhaka mahit asa, bore dista mhuno, pun mhaka visvas dovra, thodi organization tumaka zaito stress-asli problem sukoun zata.

unnormalised: Poilem, tumcho PNR number. Ho 6 digitacho code, "PNR: ZXCV12" polean, to tumcho flight ani train bookingancho jiva-rekha. To lagim samball; check-in-ak, status updates-ak ani soglleakuch to zai poddtolo. Tacho screenshot kadd, boroun ghe, dhokxent dovrun ghe – tumkam jem cholta tem kara! Fokot dhokxent dovrunk ravonaka!
normalised: Pehle tumcho P-N-R number. He chah digit-cho code, “P-N-R: Z-X-C-V-ek-don” bhaxen tumchi flight ani train booking-chem jivan asa. Te tumchea lagin dovrat; tumka check-in, status update, ani dusrem kitenyem-kitem zai podtalem. Screenshot kadat, te boroilyat, path karat – tumka jem bore dishta tem karat! Te fakt pathirt ravun naka!

unnormalised: Uprant tumcho ticket number asa, choddkorun 13 digitanchi loddni "Ticket No: 1234567890123" polean. Airlines tumchem khas ticket vollkhunk hem vapurta. Tem tumchea e-ticket ani boarding passacher chaptat. Digital copy ani chapi copy dovrunk. Mhaka patie, phone chi battery vaitt vellar morta.
normalised: Ani tumcho ticket number-asa, kitekhi zaito terah digit-chi sequence “Ticket No: ek-don-tin-char-panch-so-sat-ath-nau-shun-ek-don-tin” bhaxen. Airlines tumcho nirdisht ticket vollokhunk vaparta. Te sadharanntar tumchea e-ticket ani boarding pass-cher chapun asta. Ek digital copy ani ek chaplel copy dovrat. Mhaka visvas dovra, phone-chi battery sadhanant vait vakta.

unnormalised: Hotel bookings tanchea sangata tanchea vollkhiche vostu gheun yetat. Tumcho confirmation number, kedna "Confirmation: ABC-DEF-123" sarkho dista, to motvacho. Tea viren, check-in korop ekdom trasachi zateli. Hotel reception-acher vochchea poilim teaicher don pavtti nazar marun ghe.
normalised: Hotel booking-ak tanchi identifiers-chim astat. Tumcho confirmation number, kadachit “Confirmation: A-B-C hyphen D-E-F hyphen ek-don-tin” disa taka mhotvacho. Techya viret, check-in ek kharib problem zatelim. Hotel reception-er vochunche adim tumi he double-check karat.

unnormalised: Hotelancho ulo korun, tumchea ravchea zageacho puro addres ani contact number dhokxent dovrunk yad dovrun ghe. "Hotel Paradise, Calangute Beach, Goa, 403516" polean puro addres asop ekdom adharacho, khas korun tum auto-rickshawacher va taxicher asa zalear. Tumcho driver-ak exact to zago kollta mhunn somzonkonaka.
normalised: Hotels-chi galo korun, tumchea accommodation-cho puro address ani contact number tumchea khayalet dovrun yad karat. “Hotel Paradise, Calangute Beach, Goa, char shunya tin panch ek soh” sarkho physical address tumchea lagin zavchea khatir asleli chintun di, khas tumi auto-rickshaws tumchem okolo cholovnk vapartat. Tumcho driver-ak thikani kitlem vollkhun asa mhuno tumi asum naka.

unnormalised: Desantar vochpak, tumcho passport number, "Passport No: AB1234567" polean, to ekdom motvacho. Tumchea passportachea mahiti panache xerox kadd ani tumchea asli passportantle veglle dovrat. Tumcho passport harovla va chori zala zalear tem jivachem rakxonn kortolem. Tasaach tumchi expiry date, important. Tumhi airportacher pavlea ani tumni aikolem ki tumcho passport expire zala!
normalised: International travel khatir, tumcho passport number, “Passport No: A-B-ek-don-tin-char-panch-soh-sat” mhunnun asa takam boreponan zai. Tumchea passport-che suchan-che panachi photocopy kadun tumchea original passport-chim vegle dovrat. Tumcho passport vhanvun gela tar he tumaka jivan vatoyta. Ani mhotvachem, expiry date. Kalpana karat airport-ar vechun tunka sangtay mhan tumcho passport expired zala!

unnormalised: Visas zai astanam, tankam tanche aap-aaple reference numbers astat. Visa number dhokxent dovrun ghe; tem visa stickeracher chaptat.
normalised: Visas, tunka zai podtelim, tanchi unique reference numbers astat. Visa number borun di; te sadharanntar visa sticker-cher tumchea passport-ar chapun asta.

unnormalised: Travel insurance policyancho policy number asta, "Policy No: TI-2024-07-15-1234" polean. Khas poristhitint hem upyogi poddta. Insurance companyacho contact number ani policy mahiti tumchea phonacher save korun ghe ani gharchea vangddeancho sangata share kara.
normalised: Travel insurance policies tanchem policy numbers zatay “Policy No: T-I hyphen don hazar ani tevis hyphen shunya sat hyphen pandrah hyphen ek-don-tin-char” sarkhem. He emergency-vellar boreponacho. Insurance company-cho contact number ani policy-chim details tumchea phone-ar save karat ani te tumchea ghorantle ek zana-cher share karat.

unnormalised: Tumhi Goa (va kitench dusrea zagear) drivering kortana, tumcho driver's license number laginch aslolo zai: "License No: DL-123456789012345". Kaim car rental companyank copy zai poddtelea, toxem toyar rav.
normalised: Tumi Goant driving kortat (va kaim dusrem jagear), tumcho driver's license number sodhyo asunichi yatrata ghetat: "License No: D-L hyphen ek-don-tin-char-panch-so-sat-ath-nau-shun-ek-don-tin-char-panch". Thodem car rental company-cher ek copy zai podtat, munon yevjek zavoi.

unnormalised: Hanchi xerox copy surakchit cloud storage accountacher (Google Drive va Dropbox polean) dovrat. Tumchim asli copies harovli va tumcho phone harovla zalear tumkam adhar melltolo.
normalised: He soglle mhotvache kagd patranche copy tumchea secure cloud storage account-er (Google Drive va Dropbox sarkho) dovrat. He tumka ek backup di jar tumchea physical copies va tumcho phone vhanvun gela tar.

unnormalised: Toxem, tumkam asa. Kaim extra minuttamchea toyarecher tumkam trasantle rakhunk zatolem. Sukhachie yatreo ani monan asa tea vostuncho anond ghevnk visoronaka! Ani vindaloo chakhonk visoronaka!
normalised: Bore, tho asa. Thodem dhaktem velichi tayari atam tumchi Goa-chi trip-ent potential dukhi viret tumaka vatoyta. Khuxi-che yevjekarani, ani khuxal thara! Ani vindaloo-khi prayatn korunk visrum naka!
